definition: Tongren city, capital of Tongren prefecture, Guizhou
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
humane/kernel
market/city/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Tongren the police for this situation, decided to crack down on crimes from the source.
sentences.chinese: 铜仁市警方针对此情况，决定从源头打击违法犯罪。

sentences.english: The hotel is located in the Southern Great Wall Road, opposite to the Jintan Square.
sentences.chinese: 酒店位于铜仁市南长城大道中段，金滩广场对面。
